name: Critter (FlamingSparrow)
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN Welcome to Critter!

To play, all you need to do is to click the post button to post and gain followers! As you post, your posts will show up on screen for you to enjoy.

Sometimes a random event may occur when you post, such as your post going viral or you buying a bot or two.

Bots are simple. They automatically give you followers every second!

Once you attain 200 followers, you will start getting offers. Offers allow you to sell out and earn bots as a reward, but you lose followers as a punishment for doing so. Be careful how you manage your offers!

That's it! Enjoy!

Music : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOB-ypysgoEpTbPIWfjdWtg
